    ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œ

    def find(a, target):

    start = 0 
    end = len(a) - 1
    mid = 0

    while start <= end:
        mid = (start + end) // 2
        if (a[mid] == target):
            return 1
        elif (a[mid] < target):
            start = mid + 1

        else:
            end = mid - 1
    
    return 0


n = int(input())

a = list(map(int, input().split()))
a.sort()

m = int(input())

b = list(map(int, input().split()))


for i in b:
    print(find(a, i))
